metadata.symbol: We create high end content for TV companies
metadata.description:
The BEST of 8K60 (FUHD 4320p) video was created for TCL to be on their new 8K TV's worldwide in stores. Due to Covid budget cuts, the project was put on hold indefinitely. With more and more display manufacturers creating 8K displays, the need for high end promo content is higher than ever.

Included in this NFT:

  • 7680x4320 H.265 video in 16:9 aspect ratio (uncropped) at 59.94 fps
  • No logos or watermarks. Ready for any company logo
  • Signed contract giving lifetime exclusive rights to NFT owner
  • "Endure Mortality" song WAV file
  • Custom YouTube thumbnails

Upon purchase of this NFT, the (cropped/watermarked) YouTube version of this video will be taken down within 24 hours.

A higher quality ProRes version of the video will be available if requested. Unfortunately, we could only use H.265 because of the NFT file size limitations.
metadata.title: The BEST of 8K60 (FUHD 4320p)
metadata.subtitle: Cinematic 8K TV Demo Video
metadata.name: The BEST of 8K60 (FUHD 4320p)
